description:
Description
annual observations from 1900 to 1989
number of observations :  90
observation :  country
country :  United States
title: Money, National Product and Interest Rate
reference: Stock, J.  and  M.  Watson (1999) “Testing for common trends”, Journal of the American Statistical Association, 83, 1097-1107.

parameters.r: the commercial paper rate in percent at an annual rate
parameters.y: natural log of the net national product
parameters.p: natural log of the net national product price deflator
